results.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
results.short_title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
results.latest_major_action: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) Appropriations, (2) the Budget, (3) Education and the Workforce, (4) Energy and Commerce, (5) Financial Services, (6) Foreign Affairs, (7) Homeland Security, (8) House Administration, (9) Natural Resources, (10) Oversight and Government Reform, (11) Rules, (12) Small Business, and (13) Ways and Means.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) Appropriations, (2) the Budget, (3) Education and the Workforce, (4) Energy and Commerce, (5) Financial Services, (6) Foreign Affairs, (7) Homeland Security, (8) House Administration, (9) Natural Resources, (10) Oversight and Government Reform, (11) Rules, (12) Small Business, and (13) Ways and Means.

actions.description: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
